name: Watchup: Your Daily Newscast
description:
Watchup is the smartest way to watch video news because it builds your personalized newscast from a growing number of local, national and international news channels. Discover our prestigious lineup of premium partners including CBS Interactive, Bloomberg, WSJ Live and Sky News.

Just turn it on and watch your newscast play continuously on TV. While a video plays on TV, Watchup gives you a list of related articles you can read on GamePad.

Watchup is an award-winning Stanford startup, backed by Tribune Media, Stanford and news veterans.
